table_description: AWS Serverless Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the Cluster.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: The time when the cluster was created.

columns.name: current_version
columns.description: The current version of the MSK cluster.

columns.name: state
columns.description: Settings for open monitoring using Prometheus.

columns.name: state_info
columns.description: State Info for the Amazon MSK cluster.

columns.name: tags
columns.description: A list of tags attached to the Cluster.
